Rulings.Cat: ● You can't activate 'D.D.R. - Different Dimension Reincarnation' if you do not have any monsters in your Removed Zone that can be Special Summoned, even if you would discard a monster while 'Macro Cosmos' or 'Dimensional Fissure' is applying.
Rulings.TeleDAD: ● You can't activate 'D.D.R. - Different Dimension Reincarnation' if you do not have any monsters in your Removed Zone that can be Special Summoned, even if you would discard a monster while 'Macro Cosmos' or 'Dimensional Fissure' is applying.

Rulings.Base: 1. You cannot activate "D.D.R. - Different Dimension Reincarnation" if you do not have any monsters in your Removed Zone that can be Special Summoned, even if you would discard a monster while "Macro Cosmos" or "Dimensional Fissure" is face-up on the field.

PSCT.Edison:
① Discard 1 card, then target 1 of your banished monsters; Special Summon it in Attack Position, and equip it with this card. 
② If this card leaves the field, destroy that monster.
